member.name: F:Booish.Mod.Os.Directory._dirStack
member.summary: A list representing the stack of visited directories.

member.name: T:Booish.Mod.Os.Directory
member.summary: Implements CD, DIR, LS and PWD commands.

member.name: N:Booish.Mod.Os
member.summary: The classes of this namespace implement commands for the \"booish\" shell affecting the file system like \"dir\" or \"pwd\". On the on hand, these classes allow to use \"booish\" like \"cmd.exe\". On the other hand, these classes may serve as an example for extendind the \"booish\" shell by linking assemblies.

member.name: M:Booish.Mod.Os.File.Move(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Move a file to another directory or rename it.

member.name: M:Booish.Mod.Os.File.Type(System.String)
member.summary: Type the content of a file.

member.name: M:Booish.Mod.Os.File.Run(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: If suffix of the file is .BOO, then run this file within this interpreter. Otherwise, pass the file to the system for starting a process.
